about_the_game:
"


Battlezoo Ancestries: Dragons

Dragon Ancestries.  Play A Dragon, A Real Dragon.

Who doesn't want to play a dragon? With Battlezoo Ancestries: Dragons, you can channel the might of wyrms for your next Player Character. Not a half-dragon or a dragonkin, but a true dragon!  Using both the ancestry rules and innovative archetypes, you can grow your dragon's abilities and even focus your class feats into gaining draconic power.
Battlezoo Ancestries: Dragons includes:
  • Metallic Dragons as a baseline - brass, bronze, copper, gold, and silver
  • Chromatic Dragons - black, blue, green, red, and white
  • Primal Dragons - brine, cloud, crystal, magma, and umbral
  • Imperial Dragons - forest, sea, sky, sovereign, and underworld
  • Esoteric Dragons - astral, dream, ethereal, nightmare, and occult
  • Outer Dragons - lunar, solar, time, void, and vortex
  • Planar Dragons - apocalypse, bliss, crypt, edict, havoc, infernal, paradise, rift, and tumult
  • Five New Wild Dragons native to the Indigo Isles - amber, cerulean, indigo, harlequin, vermillion
That's 45 different playable dragon ancestries/races!
Also Includes:
  • 44 new pages of lore and art for EVERY dragon outlined in the book!
  • Draconic Ravager archetype!
  • Draconic Mage archetype!
  • Rules of advancing your dragon's power building a hoard!
Designed by Mark Seifter, one of the leads on Pathfinder Second Edition, every entry in the Battlezoo Ancestries series comes with a guarantee from Mark:

It'll provide all the draconic powers you want while being a perfect fit for the power level of the base game, allowing your group to add it to the game without worrying that it will be unbalanced or have unintended consequences. If it does, you can ask Mark directly on his Twitch show, Arcane Mark, and he will offer advice for making it fit your game!

So even if your group hasn't tried 3rd party products yet, Battlezoo Ancestries: Dragons is the perfect place to start!
"
detailed_description:
"


Battlezoo Ancestries: Dragons

Dragon Ancestries.  Play A Dragon, A Real Dragon.

Who doesn't want to play a dragon? With Battlezoo Ancestries: Dragons, you can channel the might of wyrms for your next Player Character. Not a half-dragon or a dragonkin, but a true dragon!  Using both the ancestry rules and innovative archetypes, you can grow your dragon's abilities and even focus your class feats into gaining draconic power.
Battlezoo Ancestries: Dragons includes:
  • Metallic Dragons as a baseline - brass, bronze, copper, gold, and silver
  • Chromatic Dragons - black, blue, green, red, and white
  • Primal Dragons - brine, cloud, crystal, magma, and umbral
  • Imperial Dragons - forest, sea, sky, sovereign, and underworld
  • Esoteric Dragons - astral, dream, ethereal, nightmare, and occult
  • Outer Dragons - lunar, solar, time, void, and vortex
  • Planar Dragons - apocalypse, bliss, crypt, edict, havoc, infernal, paradise, rift, and tumult
  • Five New Wild Dragons native to the Indigo Isles - amber, cerulean, indigo, harlequin, vermillion
That's 45 different playable dragon ancestries/races!
Also Includes:
  • 44 new pages of lore and art for EVERY dragon outlined in the book!
  • Draconic Ravager archetype!
  • Draconic Mage archetype!
  • Rules of advancing your dragon's power building a hoard!
Designed by Mark Seifter, one of the leads on Pathfinder Second Edition, every entry in the Battlezoo Ancestries series comes with a guarantee from Mark:

It'll provide all the draconic powers you want while being a perfect fit for the power level of the base game, allowing your group to add it to the game without worrying that it will be unbalanced or have unintended consequences. If it does, you can ask Mark directly on his Twitch show, Arcane Mark, and he will offer advice for making it fit your game!

So even if your group hasn't tried 3rd party products yet, Battlezoo Ancestries: Dragons is the perfect place to start!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor

  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.

Recommended:

  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
